class_notes:
Course Title: "Applied Neuroethics" Students will gain currency and relevance in the field of applied neuroethics. Class discussions will supplement assignments which will include a peer commentary of a target article in AJOB Neuroscience and a statement paper that addresses content from an upper level neuroethics elective. There will also be in-depth discussions of Brain Death & Disorders of Consciousness, Neuroethics & Justice System, Deep Fakes, and AI and Ethics for Autonomous Agents.
 Pre Req. NBB 280 and a co-requisite of NBB 380. Students may also be admitted via permission of the instructor.
